title: Why my FPS keeps low when I use the new client ?? Can somebody help me fix it ??
body: My FPS keep staying low when I use the new client .. My internet is fast .. and If I use my old client it won't lag me that much ... I don't know why ... someone help ??

replies.body:
I often hear this issue being reported most from players running on lower-end computer hardware. If this is the case with you, you may be able to minimize the impact of the symptoms by going into your client settings (cog icon in the top-right) and *enable* "Low spec mode" and *disable* "Animation".

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

Please let me know if this helped.
I didn't use that to solve my problem but I did solve it in my own way . anyways thank you.

For me, I had that problem too. I realized it was cuz the client was constantly running in the background while taking up too much of the CPU. I went back to the old client for a while, and now, even though the new client is glitchy sometimes, the gameplay is unaffected.
